title: How to Make a Photo Frame out of a Tissue Box

steps.headline: Gather your supplies.
steps.description: These are listed below under "Things You'll Need".

steps.headline: Carefully undo the tissue box without tearing any sides.
steps.description: Doing this will make the project easier.

steps.headline: Cut off the top part that has the hole for the tissues in it.
Carefully take off the plastic lining.
Cut off one of the sides and cut off the label name along with it (for example, "Kleenex").
Check that your photo fits well behind the cardboard piece that has the hole in it.
steps.description: If not, adjust it by cutting the photo or the cardboard.

steps.headline: Place the photo between the front piece with the hole, and the back piece (one of the sides).
Finish up the basic photo frame.
steps.description: If you want to make it look extra fancy, you can punch a hole in it with a hole-puncher (or make a hole with the tip of the thumbtack) and tie the ribbon around. Or, you could border it with a photo frame border. Make sure you do one of these because both won't look good together.

text: Gather your supplies. These are listed below under "Things You'll Need". Carefully undo the tissue box without tearing any sides. Doing this will make the project easier. Cut off the top part that has the hole for the tissues in it.  Carefully take off the plastic lining.  Cut off one of the sides and cut off the label name along with it (for example, "Kleenex").  Cut off all the flaps.  Check that your photo fits well behind the cardboard piece that has the hole in it. If not, adjust it by cutting the photo or the cardboard. Place the photo between the front piece with the hole, and the back piece (one of the sides). Staple or glue it together. Finish up the basic photo frame. If you want to make it look extra fancy, you can punch a hole in it with a hole-puncher (or make a hole with the tip of the thumbtack) and tie the ribbon around. Or, you could border it with a photo frame border. Make sure you do one of these because both won't look good together.
